author: Simon Difford
description: Chocolaty bourbon with a freshening herbal blast of Fernet Branca, smoothed by sipping through a Chartreuse cream head. Like meeting the devil hidden beneath a thick white velvet blanket, this is the ultimate after-dinner cocktail.
name: Haberdasher
